content.title: Welcome to FULL FIBER PVP
content.text:
Your text could be here.

BTW, you can add as many tabs/links as you want, just follow the syntax... Until it doesnt fit anymore

Checkout the available predefined colors and the syntax for a colorized and bigger letters for the general text:

<TextStyle.LightBlue><TextStyle.LightBlue>LightBlue Text</></>
<TextStyle.Red><TextStyle.Red>Red Text</></>
<TextStyle.Green><TextStyle.Green>Green Text</></>
<TextStyle.Blue><TextStyle.Blue>Blue Text</></>
<TextStyle.Yellow><TextStyle.Yellow>Yellow Text</></>
<TextStyle.Orange><TextStyle.Orange>Orange Text</></>
<TextStyle.Violet><TextStyle.Violet>Violet Text</></>
<TextStyle.White><TextStyle.White>White Text</></>
<TextStyle.Black><TextStyle.Black>Black Text</></> < Yes its Black Text on a Black background

You can use the ARKML syntax to colorize the titles, normal text and button texts. ARKML uses RGBA values to define the colors. Here are some examples:

<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1"><RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Red Text</></>
<RichColor Color="0,1,0,1"><RichColor Color="0,1,0,1">Green Text</></>

Please keep in mind that you <TextStyle.Red>NEED TO</> unescape the doublequotes with a backslash!!!

content.title: SERVER RULES
content.text:
<ins>GENERAL</ins>
1.1) Self-promotion of any kind will result in a server ban
1.2) Alt accounts will be banned
1.3) Caging players is forbidden
1.4) No blocking access to fertile cave & wyvern nest locations
1.5) Meshing is forbidden
1.6) Trading & selling donation items or dinos is forbidden

__***BASES & BUILDING***__
2.1) Base spots must be accessible without the use of exploits, structures, tools or weapons
2.2) Open-air bases must not be in range of cave entrances or spawn points
2.3) Spam must be kept to a minimum
2.4) Carpet spam is forbidden
2.5) Each tribe may only claim 1 cave per map
2.6) Bases must not cause unnecessary server lag
2.7) Dino traps must be cleared
2.8) Blocked spawn points will be admin wiped
2.9) Clipping structure into the mesh to prevent enemy structure placement will result in that area being wiped regardless of what is built above

__***RAIDING & FOBS***__
3.1) Boxed tames & vehicles are forbidden
3.2) Unattended fobs must not be left in range of any cave entrances
3.3) After 12 hours of no activity tribes can report fobs to be admin cleared
3.4) Team raiding is not allowed
3.5) Deliberately causing excessive base lag during a raid will result in a temporary server ban

__***TRIBES***__
4.1) No switching tribemates to bypass the tribe limit
4.2) Tribe names & members must be identical on all maps
4.3) Insiding your tribe in any capacity is strongly frowned upon and will result in a temporary server ban
This text goes into the right box
